tasks.title: Obedience Check-In
tasks.description: At noon, submit a short written affirmation pledging your loyalty and reminding yourself who owns you.

tasks.title: Financial Record Submission
tasks.description: Every Friday, upload a screenshot of your bank account or transaction history showing where your money has gone this week.
tasks.reward: Possibility of financial punishment or praise

tasks.title: Feet Worship Friday
tasks.description: On Fridays, send a creative message praising the Goddess’s feet — write a poem, a fantasy, or express desire to worship them.
tasks.reward: Chance to receive a foot photo (if deserved)

tasks.title: Punishment Acceptance Ritual
tasks.description: If you have failed a task this week, perform a written punishment ritual describing what you did wrong and how you will improve.

tasks.title: Empty Wallet Proof
tasks.description: Take a photo of your empty wallet and write 'My Goddess owns me and all my money' on a note inside. Submit it like the broke loser you are.
tasks.reward: The chance to beg for forgiveness for being poor

tasks.title: Loser's Shame List
tasks.description: Write and submit a list of 10 reasons why you're unworthy of My time or attention. Use harsh, degrading language. No compliments allowed.
tasks.reward: Maybe I'll skim it and laugh

tasks.title: Humiliating Confession
tasks.description: Confess something you're deeply ashamed of — something pathetic, weak, or perverse. Make it detailed. Show Me your filth.
tasks.reward: Public or private shame depending on My mood

tasks.title: Degrade Yourself in Writing
tasks.description: Write 'I am a pathetic, worthless slave' 100 times by hand or in a document. Submit it. I want to see effort in your obedience.
tasks.reward: The privilege of seeing your degradation

tasks.title: Financial Ruin Fantasy
tasks.description: Write your most humiliating financial ruin scenario under My control. Include how you'd beg, starve, and still serve Me proudly.
tasks.reward: Nothing. I just enjoy your misery.

tasks.title: Foot Failure Fantasy
tasks.description: Write a story where you worship My feet in public and get mocked, laughed at, or kicked for being such a pathetic toy. Submit it.

tasks.title: Financial Disgrace Budget
tasks.description: Submit your full weekly budget, highlight unnecessary luxuries you’ve cut to send Me money, and call yourself a financial failure.
tasks.reward: Possibly allowed to continue existing in My world

tasks.title: Slave Name Enforcement
tasks.description: Choose a degrading slave name (e.g. worm, loser, cashpig) and refer to yourself as ONLY that in every message. Submit proof of name use.

tasks.title: Obedience Recording
tasks.description: Record yourself reading degrading affirmations about My superiority and your worthlessness. Submit the audio. Own your place.
tasks.reward: Playback for My amusement, if I bother

tasks.title: Kneel and Beg
tasks.description: Kneel for 20 minutes. After, submit a video or written message begging to continue serving, explaining why you're lucky to even be ignored.

tasks.title: Deprivation Meal
tasks.description: Eat the cheapest, blandest food you can afford. Submit a photo and explain why you don’t deserve better while I live in luxury.

tasks.title: Luxury Longing
tasks.description: Browse a luxury store online. Pick 5 things you can’t afford but I deserve. Send the links with a message admitting you’re unworthy.

tasks.title: Formal Apology for Being Trash
tasks.description: Write Me a letter apologizing for being a financial disappointment and emotional burden. Use the words: pathetic, failure, disposable.

tasks.title: Humiliation Playlist
tasks.description: Create a Spotify or YouTube playlist titled 'Owned by My Goddess'. Fill it with songs that reflect your inferiority. Share it publicly.

tasks.title: Silent Obsession
tasks.description: Stay silent for 1 hour and repeat in your mind: 'She is everything, I am nothing.' Log how many times you said it. Submit your count.

tasks.title: Beg on Social Media
tasks.description: Post on your Twitter or Reddit saying: 'I live to send money to My Goddess. She owns my wallet and my dignity.' Tag Me if allowed.

tasks.title: Send a Tribute with a Pathetic Caption
tasks.description: Send a $10+ tribute and include a note calling yourself a useless, broke little servant who’s grateful to be ignored by Me.
tasks.reward: I might not block you today

tasks.title: Wear an Embarrassing Note in Public
tasks.description: Write 'Owned by My Goddess. I exist to pay Her.' on a paper and wear it under your shirt in public for 1 hour. Send proof.

tasks.title: Financial Edge Task
tasks.description: Look at your bank balance. Pick an amount that hurts but won’t kill you. Send it to Me. Then thank Me for taking it.
tasks.reward: A single emoji if you’re lucky

tasks.title: Spend to Humiliate
tasks.description: Buy yourself a cheap, ugly item (like children's socks or pink boxers). Wear it all day and take a photo captioned 'This is all I deserve.'
tasks.reward: The joy of knowing I laughed at you

tasks.title: Wallet Destruction Ritual
tasks.description: Take a photo of your favorite card or wallet, then write 'This belongs to Her' and burn or cut it. Submit video proof.

tasks.title: Beg Me for Debt
tasks.description: Record a voice note begging Me to put you into debt. Include why you'd deserve to go broke under My rule. Send it.
tasks.reward: I may ignore it or forward it to your guilt

tasks.title: Wage Breakdown
tasks.description: Submit a detailed log of your monthly income and where every dollar goes. Circle what should be Mine. Label it 'Your priorities.'

tasks.title: Request to be Humiliated
tasks.description: Send Me a written or video request asking for a public or private humiliation order. Be detailed, be pathetic.

tasks.title: Cash Pig Selfie
tasks.description: Take a selfie holding a sign that says 'I am a cash pig for My Goddess'. Blush, cry, regret — then send it anyway.
tasks.reward: I might use it for future orders

tasks.title: Tip Jar Duty
tasks.description: Create a digital tip jar titled 'For My Goddess' on PayPal or Cash App. Send Me the link. Post it on your social if brave enough.

tasks.title: Humiliating Tribute Breakdown
tasks.description: Send Me $20+ and write a breakdown of what you had to sacrifice to afford it. Be detailed: skip meals, cancel subscriptions, explain it all.

tasks.title: Loser Price Comparison
tasks.description: Pick a luxury item I deserve. Then show Me what worthless thing you had to buy instead. Send pics side by side with captions: 'For Her / For Me'.

tasks.title: Public Pet Order
tasks.description: Walk outside wearing a leash or collar discreetly under your clothes. Take a photo in a public setting. Caption it: 'Property of My Goddess.'
